iiv.display

Class ShowPointDisplayLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • iiv.display.DisplayComponent
            • iiv.display.DisplayDraw
              • iiv.display.ShowPointDisplayLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocationMapping, NumberFormattable, ShowPointDisplay, ShowPointImage, Croppable, FilterSampling, Flippable, Rotatable, Zoomable, CNUFileObject, iiVScriptable, ShowStatus, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class ShowPointDisplayLine
extends DisplayDraw
implements ShowPointDisplay, iiVScriptable, NumberFormattable
    ShowPointDisplayLine displays show point info as a single formatted line.
    Since:
    iiV1.142
    See Also:
    ShowPointDisplay, ShowPointDialog, CNUDisplay, Serialized Form

      • showPoint

        public boolean showPoint(int[] point,
                         double value,
                         double factor,
                         java.lang.String name)
        Displays information about a point.
        Specified by:
        showPoint in interface ShowPointDisplay
        Parameters:
        point - array of indices specifying the point location
        value - value of voxel at point location
        factor - quantification factor for voxel value
        name - name of object source of the voxel
        Returns:
        true if info displayed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShowPointDialog

      • showPoint

        public boolean showPoint(int[] point,
                         double value,
                         double factor,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         XYZDouble xyzpt,
                         java.lang.String mapName)
        Display information about a point including Talairach coordinates.
        Specified by:
        showPoint in interface ShowPointDisplay
        Parameters:
        point - array of indices specifying the point location
        value - value of voxel at point location
        factor - quantification factor for voxel value
        name - name of object source of the voxel
        xyzpt - point location in talairach coordinates
        mapName - name of map used convert to talairach coordinates
        Returns:
        true if info displayed, false otherwise
        See Also:
        ShowPointDialog, CoordinateMap
